definitions.definition: In a physically flat or level manner.
In a definite manner; in a manner showing complete certainty .
examples: It was an accusation that he flatly denied.

definitions.definition: In a manner that shows no emotion .
examples: He replied flatly to the policeman's questions.

main_definition: In a physically flat or level manner.
secondary_definitions: In a definite manner; in a manner showing complete certainty .
In a manner that shows no emotion .
